00038 class Universe;
00039 class VFileSystem;

00042 // singelton
00043 class Application : public Object
00044 {
00045 public:
00046   Application(const String& resourceDirectoryName, const String& cacheDirectoryName = "cache");
00047   virtual ~Application();
00048 
00049   virtual String className() const { return String("Application"); }
00050 
00051   static Application* getInstance() 
00052     {
00053       Assertm(app,"Application singelton instantiated."); 
00054       return app; 
00055     }
00056 
00057   ref<Universe>    universe() { return theUniverse; }
00058   ref<VFileSystem> filesystem() { return theFileSystem; }
00059 
00060   static const Int versionMajor = 0; // e.g. 1.4.1
00061   static const Int versionMinor = 4;
00062   static const Int versionSubMinor = 4;
00063 
00064   static String getShortName() { return "opensim"; }
00065   static String getLongName() { return "Open Simulator (OpenSim)"; }
00066   static String getVersion() { return intToString(versionMajor) + "." + intToString(versionMinor) + "." + intToString(versionSubMinor); }
00067 
00068   void displayHeader(const String& appName="");
00069   
00070 private:
00071   Application(const Application&)  {}
00072 
00073   ref<Universe>    theUniverse;
00074   ref<VFileSystem> theFileSystem;
00075   Time *theTime; // singleton
00076   
00077   static Application* app;  // the single instance
00078 };
